SchemaSummary.Description: Objects that will be created on the target YugabyteDB.

SizingRecommendation.ColocatedReasoning: Recommended instance type with 4 vCPU and 16 GiB memory could fit 3 objects (3 tables/materialized views and 0 explicit/implicit indexes) with 0.00 MB size and throughput requirement of 0 reads/sec and 0 writes/sec as colocated. Non leaf partition tables/indexes and unsupported tables/indexes were not considered.

UnsupportedDataTypesDesc: Data types of the source database that are not supported on the target YugabyteDB.

Objects.SqlStatement:
CREATE VIEW sales.event_analysis_view AS
 SELECT range_agg(events.event_range) AS all_event_ranges,
    range_intersect_agg(events.event_range) AS overlapping_range,
    lower(range_agg(events.event_range)) AS earliest_start,
    upper(range_agg(events.event_range)) AS latest_end
   FROM sales.events;

UnsupportedFeaturesDesc: Features of the source database that are not supported on the target YugabyteDB.

UnsupportedQueryConstructs.Query:
SELECT metric_name, pg_advisory_lock(metric_id)
FROM analytics.metrics
WHERE metric_value > $1

SELECT range_intersect_agg(event_range) AS intersection_of_ranges
FROM sales.events

SELECT range_agg(event_range) AS union_of_ranges
FROM sales.events

SELECT
        any_value(name) AS any_employee
    FROM employees
